Journal Story: TrainContinue research into gearPurchase gearReview logistics plan with Kathryn

The gear is packed and we're getting ready for Kathryn to take Ed to Georgia. Ed, Kathryn, and Rebecca will hike to the top Springer Mountain. Ed will continue moving as Kathryn and Rebecca return home. Many thanks to all who dropped by the house to say "Happy Trails!" Also, many thanks in advance for the prayers.

Had a great hike up Springer Mountain and to the first stop. Unfortunately, the pain I started feeling in my shoulder before I started the trip was getting worse. Got it checked out and it looks like I have a neck issue that's going to take a while to fix. Very disappointing. I'm putting this trip on hold and will set a date to start again next year. More to follow- Dirty
